steps.title: Make Snorlax's head.
steps.content: Make Snorlax's head. Draw a lemon shaped head and two triangles to resemble the head and ears.

steps.title: Make Snorlax's arms.
steps.content: Make Snorlax's arms. Connect two banana shaped arms on each side of the head.

steps.title: Make the belly.
steps.content: Make the belly. Snorlax is known for having a gigantic stomach. Draw a large curve for the belly.

steps.title: Make the feet.
steps.content: Make the feet. Draw to circles at the bottom for feet.

steps.title: Add facial features.
steps.content: Add facial features. Draw two lines for sleepy eyes and one for the smiley mouth. Draw tiny triangles on the end of the arms for claws.

steps.title: Draw another circle on each foot for paws and add three triangles on each foot.
steps.content: Draw another circle on each foot for paws and add three triangles on each foot.

steps.title: Erase the guide lines.
steps.content: Erase the guide lines.

steps.title: Finish your drawing by adding colour.
steps.content: Finish your drawing by adding colour.

steps.title: Draw the body and head.
steps.content: Draw the body and head. Create Snorlax's head and body by drawing 2 oval shapes onto paper.

steps.title: Outline his face.
steps.content: Outline his face. Draw an m shape on the head to make the face.

steps.title: Draw Snorlax's ears.
steps.content: Draw Snorlax's ears. Create the ears by drawing 2 triangle shapes on top of the head.

steps.title: Outline the stomach by drawing a curved u shape.
steps.content: Outline the stomach by drawing a curved u shape.

steps.title: Create the feet.
steps.content: Create the feet. Draw two ovals shapes for each foot.

steps.title: Create the arms
steps.content: Create the arms Draw 2 curved u shapes for the arms.

steps.title: Draw guidelines onto the face.
steps.content: Draw guidelines onto the face. Draw guidelines to help you put the eyes and nose in the right spot.

steps.title: Create the mouth and eyes.
steps.content: Create the mouth and eyes. Draw 3 curved lines 1 for the mouth and 2 for the eyes.

steps.title: Outline the feet.
steps.content: Outline the feet. Draw 2 ovals in both feet to outline.

steps.title: Create the nails.
steps.content: Create the nails. Draw 3 curved nails on each foot.

steps.title: Erase the guidelines.
steps.content: Erase the guidelines. Remove all guidelines carefully with a good quality eraser.

steps.title: Colour in Snorlax to complete the drawing.
steps.content: Colour in Snorlax to complete the drawing.
